question: A magazine wants to include contributions from its readers for an article called ‘The book that influenced me most'. Write a letter to the editor of the magazine about the book that influenced you most. In your letter    describe what this book was about    explain how this book influenced you    say whether this book would be likely to influence other people
text: I am Cole Chen. I have read your book named ' How to be best'. It is an amazing writing I have read, The book is talking about what can we do more politely, and teach us how to be more humble.
Firstly, I want to say it is one of my best friends, It tells me what can I do when I am depressed, and how can I make myself go fast when I block at some difficulties.
Secondly, whenever I am angry with someone, It will stop me to do that, because I will be in trouble and hurt myself if I shout at my friend or my colleague whatever.
In conclusion, I would say how good this book is, and I will recommend it to all of my friends, and let them read it and learn some useful things from it.

error_list.error_des: The indefinite article, an, may be redundant when used with the uncountable noun writing in your sentence. Consider removing it.
